entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
